named-query.name: rental.maxDayId
named-query.query: SELECT MAX (r.dayId) FROM Rental r WHERE r.date = :date

named-query.name: rental.getByDayId
named-query.query: FROM Rental r WHERE r.dayId = :dayId AND r.date = :day

named-query.name: rental.getBetweenDate
named-query.query: FROM Rental r WHERE r.date BETWEEN :start AND :end ORDER BY r.id
